item.title: Calibration, Net Re-Classification Index and Goodness-of-Fit Test for Logistic Regression
item.description: This post shows how to calculate the Net Re-Classification Index and Goodness-of-Fit Test (Hosmer-Lemeshow Test) for logistic regression models. In addition, we show how to plot the calibration curves. # load packages ---------------------------------------------------------- if (!requireNamespace("pacman", quietly = TRUE)) { install.packages("pacman") } pacman::p_load(PredictABEL) pacman::p_load(aod) pacman::p_load(ggplot2) # packages for ggplot2 themes pacman::p_load_gh("hrbrmstr/hrbrthemes") pacman::p_load(ggrepel) pacman::p_load(Cairo) pacman::p_load(extrafont) extrafont::loadfonts() # colors and themes ------------------------------------------------------- # color blind palette cbbPalette <- c("#999999", "#E69F00", "#56B4E9", "#009E73", "#F0E442", "#0072B2", "#D55E00", "#CC79A7") # my theme defaults gg_sy <- theme(legend.
